sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About the Intention Web App


    What is Intention?

  • Intention is a community of healers. We strive to join people together for the purpose of healing each other.

    • How do I get involved?

  • Read through the instructions page and practice on your own loved ones. After you're comfortable with the process, pick a request to respond to in the healing circle.

    • What is distance healing?

  • Distance healing is any form of healing energy "sent" across time and space that is received and has a healing effect on the recipient.

    • Is Intention affiliated with a religion or group?

  • Healing can occur across multiple modalities. Intention isn't affiliated with any religion or group and strives to include all people.

    • What happens to my data I provide to Intent?

  • Intent will not sell your data. The data you include in a healing will be public, so keep that in mind when you share. Using intent is a free service and will strive to stay that way.

); }; export default About;
